channel.title: Annetta Starr on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce
channel.description: Recent content in Annetta Starr on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce
channel.copyright: Copyright © 2013-{year} David E. Williams. All rights reserved.

item.title: Status Update – April 5, 2019
item.description: Everyone tired. Worked late. Annetta made Dillan write page of: I will lose my bad attitude; Bruce write page of: I will keep hands to myself; and Dwyane draw: a happy picture. Lesa unloading groceries when we got home, we helped her. Pizza and Turbo movie. Dillan went to Gabe’s.

item.title: Status Update – March 25, 2019
item.description: Took kids to daycare, Lesa and I worked, busy day, went fast, tired, Lesa more tired than me. Picked up kids, Annetta and Jessica both said kids were good. No Scouts. Lesa backed Jeep into electrical box, pulled her off with truck / chains. Played Sorry and Yahtzee, kids up late.

item.title: Status Update – October 16, 2018
item.description: Took kids to daycare, went to work, worked 9 hours. Annetta took boys to Springville Park. Lesa off early for eye exam, picked up kids after. Boys played at Gabe’s, I passed them on way home. Salisbury steak, mashed potatoes, veggies for dinner, kids gobbled it up. Scary TV show.

item.title: Status Update – October 11, 2018
item.description: Barely made bus, Bruce no shoes, Dwyane playing with LEGOs in underwear come time to leave. Parent/teacher conferences, no big surprises except Ashley in Accelerated Program and didn’t tell us. Annetta/Jessica watched kids, took to Pizza Hut with us, whose behaved kids are these?

item.title: Status Update – September 19, 2018
item.description: Lesa worn out, I’m worn out, it’s only Wednesday! Bruce field trip to Springville Fire Station, learned about equipment, etc. At daycare, Bruce took big bag of M&Ms; him, Dillan, Dwyane ate entire bag; Annetta asked me to replace. Stay-at-home evening, big kid bath/shower. No TV.

item.title: Kid Quote of the Day – August 24, 2018
item.description: Annetta, from daycare: I smell poop. Dillan: No it’s just my feet. I didn’t wear socks.

item.title: Status Update – April 4, 2018
item.description: Decent day, worked 9.5 hours, the new norm. Lesa trying to quit smoking, on Chantix; totally stressed, grouchy, irritable; understandable. We’re going to stick with Imagination Station in Oolitic, Jessica and Annetta bought it. Went to H&R Block to file taxes, left our paperwork.

item.title: Status Update – April 2, 2018
item.description: Started to work, got halfway there, turned around, worked from home. Less stress, no kids, no office. Jessica said her and Annetta starting new daycare in Oolitic, will watch all our kids, transport to Springville! Ticket came in at dinner. Took Dillan to Scouts. Finished ticket.

item.title: Status Update – March 12, 2018
item.description: Kids on Spring Break, stayed at daycare, sucks! Lesa stayed home. Worked. Got kids: talked to Annetta, Jenny, and Chandler about daycare closing; we’re going to be in trouble! Salmon for supper. Rusty Nut can’t work on Jeep for four weeks! Picked it up, took it to Tire ‘n’ Wheel.

item.title: Status Update – September 13, 2017
item.description: Much better on time this morning. Texts from Annetta regards Bruce’s behavior, don’t know what to do, find new daycare, Kozy Kids? Miserable at work, full blown cold. Wanted to go to Walmart, Lesa needed me home to control kids. Reading and spelling with Ashley, math with Dillan.

item.title: Status Update – August 22, 2017
item.description: Tired, trying to catch cold, long non-productive day. Hard rain. Ashley and Dwyane fought in daycare van over snacks, Annetta had to separate, Dwyane having hard time getting along with others lately. Dillan had math homework, Ashley reading, both spelling. Owl stalking chickens.

item.title: Status Update – July 3, 2017
item.description: Took Dillan to Noah Stinson’s, they put together Legos, played racquetball. Lesa went to Walmart. Tony and Noah brought Dillan home. Cleaned/filled pool, went swimming with kids. Test drove Jeep, bought for $4000. Watched Batman Lego movie. Shot fireworks from Jessica and Anneta.

item.title: Status Update – March 17, 2017
item.description: Friday! Short workday. Talked with Annetta for an hour about kids. Bruce called her poopyhead, hides from teachers, spits, and other. Ashley smarts off. Dillan gets mad, follows wrong crowd, when leading makes poor choices. Dwyane good as always. Pizza! Watched The Good Dinosaur.

item.title: Status Update – March 24, 2016
item.description: Much better day! Dwyane super proud of new Paw Patrol backpack. Annetta Starr dressed in Easter Bunny outfit when I picked kids up from daycare, Bruce afraid of big characters, won’t go near! Rained off-and-on, kids stuck inside. Dillan tried to be loving, I can tell it’s forced.
